Module jfx
Package com.CodeSmell.stat

Class StatTracker

java.lang.Object
com.CodeSmell.stat.StatTracker
public class StatTracker extends Object
A class that is meant to contain potentially useful statistics that can aid in the detection of code smells and for general use case purposes including determining potential bugs within the CodeSmell tool itself.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final Map<CPGClass.Attribute,AttributeStat>
    attributeStats
    Group all the CPGClass.Attribute with a AttributeStat containing statistics about that attribute
    final Map<CPGClass,ClassStat>
    classStats
    Group all the CPGClass with a ClassStat containing statistics about that class and its attributes and methods via AttributeStat and MethodStat respectively
    final Map<CPGClass.ClassType,List<CPGClass>>
    distinctClassTypes
    Group all CPGClass by their classType.
    final Map<ClassRelation.RelationshipType,List<CodePropertyGraph.Relation>>
    distinctRelations
    Group all the relations present within cpg by their ClassRelation.RelationshipType
    final Helper
    helper
    A helper object consisting of potentially useful collections of elements withing cpg such as all attributes, all methods, method parameters, method calls, attribute calls, and names of classes, attributes and methods within cpg.
    final List<CPGClass.Method>
    longMethods
    Group all methods with a total method length being greater than a provided limit, as of this moment - 30 lines.
    final List<CPGClass.Method>
    longParameterMethod
    Group all methods with a parameter length being greater than a provided limit, as of this moment - 4 parameters.
    final Map<CPGClass.Method,MethodStat>
    methodStats
    Group all the CPGClass.Method with a MethodStat containing statistics about that method
    final Map<String,Integer>
    packageUse
    Group all classes to their respective packages and maintain a sum of the usage of each class within that package as the total package usage for that package

    • determineDistinctClassTypes

      private static Map<CPGClass.ClassType,List<CPGClass>> determineDistinctClassTypes(CodePropertyGraph cpg)
      Iterates through the cpg to determine all the distinct class types that are present such as abstract class, class, enum, interface.
      Parameters:
      cpg - The CodePropertyGraph containing all existing classes and relations
      Returns:
      A map containing all the distinct class types within cpg

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • determinePackageUsage

      private static Map<String,Integer> determinePackageUsage(Map<CPGClass,ClassStat> classStats)
      Determine the usage of each package by summing the class usage of every class within that package.
      Parameters:
      classStats - A map containing a class stat for every class
      Returns:
      A map indicating how many times each package was used

    • findLongParameterMethods

      private static List<CPGClass.Method> findLongParameterMethods(Helper helper, int limit)
      Group all methods with a total number of parameters greater than a specified limit value into a single list.
      Parameters:
      helper - The helper consisting of useful collections of elements within cpg
      limit - The minimum number of parameters a method should have to be considered a long parameter method
      Returns:
      A list of all methods within cpg that satisfy this criteria

    • findLongMethods

      private static List<CPGClass.Method> findLongMethods(Helper helper, int limit)
      Group all methods with a total method length greater than a specified limit value into a single list.
      Parameters:
      helper - The helper consisting of useful collections of elements within cpg
      limit - The minimum length that a method should be to be considered a long method
      Returns:
      A list of methods within cpg that satisfy this criteria
